gameDetails.name: Arkwright: Noblesse Oblige
gameDetails.description:
Contained in Brettspiel Adventskalender 2016 for Day 13.

Includes 1 luxury goods market mat and 4 purveyor development tiles (1 per type of good)

Additional Rules:
At the beginning of the a round, one good cube is placed on each space in the luxury goods market of the current and all previous technology levels (no luxury good of food in stage 1)

In the production and sale phase, just before the domestic selling step, players will have the opportunity to sell in the luxury goods market for the active goods.

Player with the highest reputation goes first. The sale is voluntary. Those who do not sell when it is their turn must pass for the remainder of this step completely and places the machine token from their price track back into the supply
